text:
Created attachment 22335
sample configuration for reproducing the problem

within the migration of our reverse proxy from apache 2.0 to apache 2.2 on solaris 10 we detected a big perfomance difference. with the same configuration of mod_proxy with ssl between proxy and application server requests need 2 to 3 times longer with apache 2.2 as with apache 2.0. i installed also apache 2.2 on windows and linux with the same proxy configuration and i could not reproduce the problem.

it seems to me there is a problem of apache 2.2 mod_proxy with ssl on solaris 10. we reproduced the problem on sparc and amd machines.
creator: mkjordi@gmail.com
rpluem@apache.org
text: Do you have the same problem when serving static files via SSL on Solaris 10?
What version of openssl do you use on Solaris 10? Is it supplied by Sun?
creator: rpluem@apache.org

text:
we tried different combinations of openssl and apache, selfcompiled and distributed by sun. the used versions of openssl are 0.9.8g/h.

i didn't try static content explicit and will do this test on monday.
creator: mkjordi@gmail.com

text: i did some tests with static content. the perfomance is good with and without ssl. the problem only exists if we connect with ssl from the proxy to the application server.
creator: mkjordi@gmail.com

text:
i did some tests with static content. the perfomance is good with and without
ssl. the problem only exists if we connect with ssl from the proxy to the

text: Closing very old tickets, please re-open them if you still need to follow up.
